headline: Baxter to Present at Stifel 2024 Healthcare Conference
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., November 12, 2024--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX), a global medtech leader, will present at the Stifel 2024 Healthcare Conference on Monday, November 18, 2024. Joel Grade, Baxter’s chief financial officer, is scheduled to present at 8:35 a.m. Eastern Time.
